p: The reference antibiotic (ampicillin) was inactive against K. pneumoniae, however the crude extract showed some activity (23%) against the microbial strain. Gram-positive S. aureus was observed to be resistant to the crude extract and the purified flavonoid at the tested concentrations. The crude extract and the pure flavonoid (6-methyltectochrysin) were inactive against P. aeruginosa though ampicillin showed 11% inhibition at a concentration of 111 Âµg/mL.
